languages.text: "Слишком быстро. Слишком легко. Ксенос унес в могилу слишком много знаний. И ушел... непростительно просто".
"It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."
languages.original_text: "Слишком быстро. Слишком легко. Ксенос унес в могилу слишком много знаний. И ушел... непростительно просто".

traits.locale_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “那个异形死得太快了，太简单了。有太多知识被他带进了坟墓，他死得还不够……痛苦，远远不够。”
languages.original_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: “那个异形死得太快了，太简单了。有太多知识被他带进了坟墓，他死得还不够……痛苦，远远不够。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « C'était trop rapide. Trop facile. Le xénos a emporté bien des secrets avec lui dans la tombe. Et sa mort n'a pas été assez... douloureuse. Loin de là. »
languages.original_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: « C'était trop rapide. Trop facile. Le xénos a emporté bien des secrets avec lui dans la tombe. Et sa mort n'a pas été assez... douloureuse. Loin de là. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Ha sido demasiado rápido. Demasiado fácil. El xenos se ha llevado demasiado conocimiento a la tumba. Y su muerte no ha sido... suficientemente agónica. Ni de lejos».
languages.original_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido demasiado rápido. Demasiado fácil. El xenos se ha llevado demasiado conocimiento a la tumba. Y su muerte no ha sido... suficientemente agónica. Ni de lejos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「早計に過ぎた。たわいもなかった。あの異種族が数多の知識ごと死んでしまうとは。奴が去るとは…不快とは言えぬ。決してそんなことはないのだが」
languages.original_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: 「早計に過ぎた。たわいもなかった。あの異種族が数多の知識ごと死んでしまうとは。奴が去るとは…不快とは言えぬ。決してそんなことはないのだが」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Es ging zu schnell. Zu leicht. Der Xenos hat zu viel Wissen mit ins Grab genommen. Und sein Ableben war nicht ... qualvoll genug. Bei weitem nicht."
languages.original_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: "Es ging zu schnell. Zu leicht. Der Xenos hat zu viel Wissen mit ins Grab genommen. Und sein Ableben war nicht ... qualvoll genug. Bei weitem nicht."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."

languages.text: "Çok hızlıydı. Fazla kolaydı. Zeno, bildiklerini de kendisiyle birlikte mezara gömdü. Aramızdan ayrılışı yeterince acılı olmadı. Hem de hiç."
languages.original_text: "It was too quick. Too easy. The xenos took too much knowledge with him to the grave. And his departure was not... agonising enough. Far from it."

traits.locale_text: "Çok hızlıydı. Fazla kolaydı. Zenolar bildiklerini de onunla mezara gömdü. Aramızdan ayrılışı yeterince acılı değildi. Hem de hiç."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
